channel.title: Poetry Trump Immigration Mexico on Jeffrey Cyphers Wright
channel.description: Recent content in Poetry Trump Immigration Mexico on Jeffrey Cyphers Wright

item.title: Build a Wall
item.description: Let’s build a wall using […] Jeff read the poem on the last day of the 2nd New Orleans Poetry Festival. The final open reading was held outdoors on a sunny afternoon at the famous Maple Leaf Bar. Poem text and collage by JCW can be found on Poets Reading the News
